summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WA Scheduler update functionality. Backend APIs work perfectly on localhost:8001, but frontend-backend integration fails due to missing REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable. Update functionality works via direct API calls but not through the web UI.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 'No log file found for backend' - logs directory structure may need setup

integration_issues.issue: Frontend making API calls to localhost:3000/api/* instead of localhost:8001/api/* due to missing REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable
integration_issues.root_cause: REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable not set, defaults to empty string

passed_tests: Backend /api/updates/check endpoint returns correct update info (200 OK)
Backend /api/updates/install endpoint works and returns success (200 OK)
Backend /api/diagnostics endpoint returns system diagnostics (200 OK)
Backend /api/diagnostics/logs endpoint returns logs summary (200 OK)
Update section is visible with Check for Updates button
Backend logs section visible in diagnostics UI
All backend API endpoints respond correctly on localhost:8001
Update install API returns success with version info and file change count
Frontend UI components render without errors

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (UI loads but API integration completely broken)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Set REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable for frontend. Frontend is making all API calls to localhost:3000/api/* instead of localhost:8001/api/* because REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL is not configured. This completely breaks frontend-backend integration. The update functionality works perfectly via direct API calls but fails through the web UI due to this configuration issue.
